open.description: Whether or not the `<Overlay />` is open

transition.description: The type of `<Transition />` to use for animating in/out

onOpen.description: Callback fired when `<Portal />` content has been mounted in the DOM

onClose.description: Callback fired when `<Portal />` has been unmounted from the DOM

mountNode.description:
An element or a function returning an element to use as the mount node
for the `<Portal />` (defaults to `document.body`)

insertAt.description: Insert the element at the 'top' of the mountNode or at the 'bottom'

label.description: An accessible label for the `<Overlay />` content

defaultFocusElement.description: An element or a function returning an element to focus by default

contentElement.description: An element or a function returning an element that wraps the content of the `<Overlay />`

tsType.name: signature
tsType.raw:
(
  event: React.UIEvent | React.FocusEvent,
  documentClick?: boolean
) => void

onDismiss.description: Callback fired when the `<Overlay />` is requesting to be closed

in.description: Show the component; triggers the enter or exit animation

unmountOnExit.description: Unmount the component (remove it from the DOM) when it is not shown

transitionOnMount.description:
Run the enter animation when the component mounts, if it is initially
shown

onEnter.description: Callback fired before the "entering" classes are applied

onEntering.description: Callback fired after the "entering" classes are applied

onEntered.description: Callback fired after the "enter" classes are applied

onExit.description: Callback fired before the "exiting" classes are applied

onExiting.description: Callback fired after the "exiting" classes are applied

onExited.description: Callback fired after the "exited" classes are applied

title: Overlay
